10.0.0.2
6039
80000000
00000000
aaaaffff
00000000
## Begin
# BCLK_MODE, 100bin == 4hex
# 4: triggered externally, no  test-pulse, no  reset <-- Physics Run 
# 3: triggered internally, yes test pulse, yes reset <-- Cal Pulse
# 6: triggered externally, yes test-pulse, no  reset <-- Cal Pulse + exttrg
00000000
00000004
# BCKL_TRGBURST
00000001
#00000008 = (8+1)*3 = 27 time bins
#00000008
#00000004 = (4+1)*3 = 15 time bins
00000003
# BCKL_FREQ, 10000dec == 2710hex
# (1/f[Hz])/(64*25e-9)
# 100Hz --> (1/100)/(64*25e-9)=6250=0x186A
#	f[Hz]	dec	hex
#	1	625000	00098968
#	10	62500	0000F424
#	50	12500	000030D4
#	100	6250	0000186A
#	150	4166.67	00001046
#	200	3125	00000C35
#	250	2500	000009C4
#	300	2083.33	00000823
#	350	1785.71	000006F9
#	400	1562.5	0000061A
#	450	1388.89	0000056C
#	500	1250	000004E2
#	600	1041.67	00000411
#	700	892.86	0000037C
#	800	781.25	0000030D
#	900	694.44	000002B6
#	1000	625	00000271
00000002
#00098968
#0000F424
#000030D4
#0000186A
#00001046
#00000C35
#00000823
#000006F9
#0000061A
#000004E2
#00000411
0000030D
# BCKL_TRGDELAY, 23dec == 17hex
00000003
#00000100
0000006d
# BCKL_TPDELAY, 80hex == 128 dec
00000004
#0000007F
00000066
# BCKL_ROSYNC, 0x6e == 110
00000005
#0000012c
00000090
# EVBLD_CHMASK, 0x0F == b00001111
00000008
000000FF
# EVBLD_DATALENGTH
00000009
#00000fa0 = 4000
#00000fa0
#00000bb8 = 3000
#00000bb8
#000009c4 = 2500
#000009c4
#000007d0 = 2000
000007b0
#000005dc = 1500
#000005dc
#000003e8 = 1000
#000003e8
#000002ee = 750
#000002EE
#000001f4 = 500
#00000200
#00000064 = 100
#00000064
# EVBLD_MODE
0000000a
00000002
# EVBLD_EVENTINFOTYPE
0000000b
00000000
# EVBLD_EVENTINFODATA
0000000c
#00000200
aabb0bb8
